summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting a phone call to discuss an attached document (3501.000-146.pdf) related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email requesting a call to discuss an attached document related to the Epstein case.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is communicating about the Epstein case.
The email references an attached document with the filename 3501.000-146.pdf.
The communication is marked as an external email, indicating it may involve parties outside the DOJ.
The email is dated November 20, 2021, showing ongoing case activity years after Epstein's death.
